text:
e="preserve">Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorcorated is an animated mystery comedy-drama series. This is the eleventh series in the Scooby-Doo franchise. Scooby-Doo Mystery Inc. includes many aspects of the early series such as following a formula similar to Scooby-Doo Where Are You!. This series also differs from past ones by its use of a serial format, character drama, and by being the first time that the franchise to uses real monsters since "The 13 Ghosts of Scooby-Doo".
Just like the past series Mystery Inc. redesigns the characters, but this time they have a retro look with only small changes, like Velma now wearing bows in her hair.
Season 1.
Fred Jones, Daphne Blake, Shaggy Rogers, Velma Dinkley, and Scooby-Doo are a group of teenage detectives who live and solve mysteries in the town of Crystal Cove. Crystal Cove is said to be haunted which creates a big tourist industry, the adults of thw town are not happy with the teens discovering that all the supernatural occurences are false.In addition to their regular mystery solving the teens also find themselves involved with a mystery of a cursed treasure and the mysterious disapearance of a previous mystery solving group. Also making things more complicated they are tangled in complex relationship problems affecting their unity as a group.
Season 2.
The original mystery solving groups returns which begins a race to find the pieces of a map which will lead to the cursed treasure. As they continue this search they find out that they are not the only mystery solving group that has lived in Crystal Cove.The secret connection with past gangs will reveal the truth behind the cursed in Crystal Cove. Now the fate of both gangs and reality itself is in their hands as the apocalyse gets closer.
